concept.title: Configuring client certificates
concept.shortdesc: You can authenticate based on client certificates by uploading the root CA certificates and intermediate CA certificates, or the client certificates to the truststore. You can upload the CA certificates or client certificates by using the or by using .

conbody.p: Each CA certificate or client certificate that you upload is associated with a security profile. The certificate is used with that security profile to authenticate certificates that are presented by client applications. For performance reasons, you might want to upload CA certificates only. Uploading certificates for each client and associating each client certificate with a security profile might affect connection performance.
